entry.title: Fresh cup of coffee
entry.content: JavaScript: The platform of the future? With Node.js on the hotspot everyone is looking back to using JavaScript as server-side language. And while Node.js is pretty awesome, I really donâ€™t think c-like languages are expressive. CoffeeScript is a Ruby inspired language that compiles to JavaScript. It has great syntax and cool features like interactive mode. Definately project to watch.
